meanings.definition: Fit to be seen; suitable for being presented to others.
meanings.sent1: She made sure her outfit was presentable before going to the party.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work was so presentable that it caught the attention of many visitors.
meanings.sent3: Even though the cake was not very presentable, it still tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: His speech was as presentable as a beautifully wrapped gift.
meanings.sent5: The garden looked incredibly presentable after she finished decorating it.

meanings.definition: Capable of being presented or displayed in a pleasing manner.
meanings.sent1: The new furniture was so presentable that it transformed the room.
meanings.sent2: The chef ensured that each dish was presentable before sending it out to customers.
meanings.sent3: The dog's attempt at wearing a hat was surprisingly presentable.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the most presentable colors.
meanings.sent5: The team worked hard to make the project as presentable as possible for the presentation.
